title: The Troubling Implications Of The Celebrity Photo Leak
teaser: To learn more about the recent celebrity photo hack, Melissa Block speaks with Matthew Green of Johns Hopkins University. They discuss how the photos might have been obtained.
contentencoded:
To learn more about the recent celebrity photo hack, Melissa Block speaks with Matthew Green of Johns Hopkins University. They discuss how the photos might have been obtained, as well as how you can protect your own material saved to the cloud.

Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
